Data Fields
flash_pageinfo_t Struct Reference
Flash Memory

Flash page info for use with I_FLASH_GETPAGEINFO. More...

#include <flash.h>

Collaboration diagram for flash_pageinfo_t:

Detailed Description

This data structure holds the details of a flash page.

Data Fields

uint32_t page
 The page number.
 
uint32_t addr
 The starting address.
 
uint32_t size
 The page size.
